creator: ybabenko@yahoo.com
text:
Tomcat 3.3 sometimes passes 'localhost' IP as client IP to ServletRequest
instead of the real client IP. I haven't been able to note a pattern though.

I've tried on both Linux 2.4 and Solaris 7.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4564 ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
